puakma.system
Class Cookie

java.lang.Object
  puakma.system.Cookie
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class Cookie
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable

Simple wrapper class for dealing with http cookies. A document will have a Hashtable containing a bunch of these.

Constructor Summary
Cookie(java.lang.String szNameValuePair)
          Used to create cookies when passed up from the client defaults to NOT send to client Name=Value

 java.lang.String getCookieString()
          Returns the full string used by the http server: Set-Cookie: Name=Value; expires=DATE; path=Path; domain=DOMAIN; secure url is encoded in case there are spaces or ; or special chars
